iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Instead of skipping the `test eax, eax` and `jz` instructions, we should try to match them more precisely to avoid the unintended side effect of altering the program flow. This will allow the program to execute as intended, while still triggering the YARA rule.
